title: Pistilli Roman Font Release
content:
Pistilli Roman has been released by Veer.

[http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000118](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218044510/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000118 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000118")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218044510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JBT0000118_P_3844.GIF)

Developed by the talented Jason Walcott and although it doesn't adhere to the previous typeface by Herb Lubalin, it's got that special something!
author: dizerr

comments.content:
Pistilli Roman was designed by John Pistilli _and_ Herb Lubalin. More info here:

[http://blogs.walkerart.org/design/2007/12/26/pistilli-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218044510/http:/blogs.walkerart.org/design/2007/12/26/pistilli-roman/ "http://blogs.walkerart.org/design/2007/12/26/pistilli-roman/")
